divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 14 years old, living in the country with my mother. I had a boyfriend that lived in the next neighborhood. I snuck out one night to go see him, and on my way home, I felt like some one was watching me. I got the chills and decided to look around to see if I could find anyone watching me. I followed the "feeling" of being watched, and ended up looking toward the sky. At first I didn't see anything, but after my eyes had adjusted to the darkness, I noticed a dark triangle in the sky, where the stars did not shine through. After watching it for a moment, I noticed it was actually just barely above the tree line. I was overcome with fear, and the sense that some one was seriously looking at me. I ran home as quickly as I could, and when I turned to see it again, it silently took off over the trees. They moved in a breeze, but I never heard the sound of an engine or anything. The next day, my mom said there were people out at the ranch asking questions about ufo's. I didn't speak up for fear of getting grounded for sneaking out....
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Victoria
There were no other sightings in Victoria on or around September 20th 1997
